org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.interceptor.server

Class AbstractServerInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.interceptor.AbstractInterceptor
      • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.interceptor.server.AbstractServerInterceptor

  • public abstract class AbstractServerInterceptor
extends AbstractInterceptor
    Extend this class and annotate your class with one or more of the following annotations to write any interceptors for the UltraESB server lifecycle.

    If the interceptors AbstractInterceptor.intercept(org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.interceptor.Event) method returns false the engine will stop the lifecycle action if applicable, and any further interceptions.

    The available server lifecycle annotations are;

    • OnStartupRequest - on startup request received by the server
    • OnShutdownRequest - on shutdown request received by the server
    • OnRestartRequest - on restart request received by the server
    • OnServerReady - on server ready for processing the messages, i.e. all done and set to go
    • BeforeInitialize - before servers starts to initialize
    • AfterInitialize - after servers finished initialization
    • BeforeStart - before server starts the start action
    • AfterStart - after server finishes the start action
    • BeforeStop - before server starts the stop action
    • AfterStop - after server finishes the stop action
    • BeforeShutdown - before server starts the to shutdown
    • AfterShutdown - after server finished the shutdown
    Since:
    2.0.0
